title: I Have A Boyfriend
description:
Description :
        A campus love story that is more lovely because it's clumsy. Kang Hyeon Ho, who belongs in the university soccer team goes into a breadth class and encounters the person he went to middle school together with and was his first love, Han Gyeol. To avoid the regret of not properly conveying his feelings again, Kang Hyeon Ho approaches Han Gyeol, but after losing his parents and left in a relative's house with a younger brother, he works hard in part time job and doesn't give his heart easily. But due to Hyeon Ho's persistent advances, Han Gyeo slowly opens his heart too..
